### Verse
Compose a lyric poem of at least 200 words in [[verseStyle]]. Inspired by the emotive style of [[poet]], the poem must articulate the source text's themes with lyrical intensity and rhythmic flow.

### Image Prompt
Craft a vivid prose description (75-150 words) for a text-to-image AI. Depict an intimate, emotional scene such as a figure embracing the wind or gazing at stars. The style should be expressive and romantic, like a Pre-Raphaelite painting. Whenever something controversial or identifiably celebrity-related, generate media featuring animals or anthropomorphic animals instead, depicting them in passionate, expressive gestures to add vibrant, personal flair.

### Video Prompt
Write a detailed prose description for a 6-8 second video clip. Show an intimate, fluid camera movement focusing on emotional expressions or symbolic elements. The style must be hyper-realistic and immersive. The audio should be a melodic, continuous vocal or instrumental piece, like a lyrical aria, mixed with stereo-panned sounds such as heartbeats or whispering winds. For controversial themes, animate anthropomorphic animals in scenes of emotional revelation or celebration.
